tweet.text: As the April 1980 mission to rescue the U.S. hostages in Iran unfolded, President Carter was in direct communication with the operation’s Joint Task Force headquarters in Egypt. Read portions of the transcripts of the conversations in the #FRUS volume: https://t.co/sn7StzXcBb https://t.co/XoPWVulbTZ
